archimate:BusinessObject.name: Job
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation: The Job is a means to group together the Job Order and Job Response into a single entity. The definitions of both Job Order and Job Response are governed by ISA95. A job inherits all the properties of a Work Master (aka. Recipe), including specificaitons for the bill of materials, production process, equipment and related configurations, and the qualifications of operators. The Job can therefore be considered a specific instance of the Work Master in which medicines product is manufactured. A Job is broken down into sub-units of the process.
